ios.subtitle: Roll the Dice, Pass Go & Win

name: Ticket to Ride The Board Game

editorialNotes.standard: Form smart alliances to keep the spice flowing in this superb digital re-imagining of the popular board game.

Switch on the laser pointer! Scoop the litter! Rub the belly of the all-seeing Pig-a-Corn! This mobile version of the insanely irreverent card game brings the fatal felines to our devices, along with a few purr-fect new twists. The hysterical illustrations by Matthew Inman (creator of The Oatmeal) spring to life with animation and soundand a meter that tracks the chance of drawing an exploding kitten makes the game even more hilariously tense. Played face-to-face with friends or online against strangers, its surprisingly strategic and cat-astrophically fun.

editorialNotes.tagline: A card game for seasoned traders

name: Tsuro - The Game of the Path

editorialNotes.standard: This gorgeous digital board game couldnt be any simpler to learn, but true mastery lies at the end of a long and winding path. As fans of Tsuros tabletop incarnation, we love how faithfullyand beautifullythe experience is re-created here. App-exclusive ways to play add new layers of depth, letting us get lost for hours among these tricky, twisty trails.

ios.subtitle: The family game of your life!
